segments.text: Why don't we get you some shirts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to leave . We've already been here two hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we should get you some shirts while we're here . You need summer shirts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would rather buy them somewhere else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? They have everything here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like shopping in malls . I like shopping on the street . There is more variety .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's just look and see what they have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about these shirts ? Do you see anything you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The styles here are too boring for me . I told you . I like street shopping .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on ! Don't be so sour . These are beautiful shirts . I know if we don't buy some today , you will never go shopping by yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure I would .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here . Look at this shirt . Try it on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do they have it in LARGE .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . Let me look on the rack . Here is one . LARGE . Try it on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is the fitting room ? I don't see it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fitting rooms are over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I will try it on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks good on you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I look like a nerd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it looks great.Why are you always like this when you're shopping ? You know it looks good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't think it's the best style for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we'll buy this one . And I want you to try on this one too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Alright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should be happy I want you to look good.If I let you shop for yourself , you would never buy anything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , maybe . But I like street shopping . There is more variety . I'm sorry . I just don't like malls .
segments.speaker: S2
